name: Stone Edge
description: The earth moves beneath a targetâ€™s feet as sharp stone pierce through the ground underneath them. Creatures in a 10 foot radius centered on a point you choose in range must make a DEX save against your MOVE DC, taking 4d4 + MOVE rock damage on a fail, or half as much on a save.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
